snippet.title: Runewards - Trailer
snippet.description:
Runewards is a free-to-play strategy card game which allows players to play one against another in an epic battle!
Runewards is a game about strategy, about bluffing and about out-smarting your opponent. Easy to learn but hard to master. 
Play in a Gameboard with three Territories, where you place your cards matters. Units, Spells and Heroes will have abilities that can influence other Units, Territories or the entire Gameboard itself.
If you want to succeed, you will need more than just playing the game, you will need to outplay your opponent!

Stay tuned at
http://Runewards.com

Subscribe!
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCi3laYAMDTKRrcqtLiPIphQ

Follow us for the latest news and updates!
https://forum.runewards.com/
http://Facebook.com/runewards
http://Twitter.com/runewards
